content:
The Vlocity Insurance Application for Property & Casualty includes a fully functioning policy administration and claims system for multi-auto, multi-driver auto insurance.

Product modeling defines all the products sold and serviced. Rating procedures price these products, then connect to them. We've created several product models and rating procedures, using the Multi Auto model in this document.

Business processes available include:

* Quote: configure, price (rate), underwrite, and present quotes
* Issue Policy: choose payment schedules and methods, enter payment information, and issue an insurance policy
* Modify Policy (Add Endorsements/MTAs): add endorsements to in-force policies
* Cancel Policy: cancel in-force policies and issue refunds

The Auto Application includes claims functionality for taking in First Notice of Loss (FNOL) data, creating and updating claim records, and adjudicating claims. Direct Billing and Auto Pay allow policyholders, agents, and admin users to set up automatic payments or receive bills directly.

Business processes also include:

* Renew Policy: renew policies with a simple email link
* Quote Business Process: create quotes using various business processes
* Endorsements/MTAs for Auto Business Processes: add endorsements and MTAs to auto insurance policies
* Cancel Policy Business Process: cancel in-force policies and issue refunds

Auto Product Model and Attribute Catalog define attributes used for the Auto line of business. Auto Rating uses product model data, rating procedure, and pricing formulas to price coverages, vehicles, and total premium.

State Models underpin workflow and claim rules for all Property & Casualty Application Suite lines of business. Issue Policy Business Process issues insurance policies from quotes. Renew Policy Business Process renews policies with a simple email link.
title: Vlocity Insurance Application Guide
